attack-object.name: Exploit Public-Facing Application
attack-object.comments: This mapping file covers Docker container registries security features along with the Azure Defender for Container Registries scanner. The scanning capability of the control is only available for Linux images in registries accessible from the public internet with shell access which limits the general applicability.
attack-object.score-comment: This control may provide provide information about vulnerabilities within container images. The limited scope of containers and registries that are applicable to this control contribute to the lower score.

attack-object.name: Implant Container Image
attack-object.comments: This mapping file covers Docker container registries security features along with the Azure Defender for Container Registries scanner. The scanning capability of the control is only available for Linux images in registries accessible from the public internet with shell access which limits the general applicability.
attack-object.score-comment: This control may prevent adversaries from implanting malicious container images through fine grained permissions and use of container image tag signing. Image tag signing allows for verifiable container images that have been signed with legitimate keys.
